What we did Working principles

Ability - Insight #19

People are doing their own thing

We believe...

Some people have created their own tools and registers, to meet their own needs. However, this then ignores the needs of the business partners.
This results in wasted time for BPs etc filling the gaps

Because we've seen and heard...

"I have the Group Risk Register, then I also have the one I actually use."

People using different tools such as Jira, Trello, PowerPoint and Sharepoint

"We based it on the group risk register but took out all the columns we don't need"

"We created our on risk register which allows linked and a more granular view. This is easier to talk through with risk owners"

61% of resondees use the risk register to record risk, of these 20% doctor it to their own needs.

User need #6

When I’m managing risk
I need to be able to demonstrate we’re doing the right things
So that people don’t stop us from progressing

User need #10

When I’m managing my risks
I need to be able to work in the most efficient way possible
So that I’m not wasting time on things that don’t add value

User need #11

When I’m managing risk
I need to be able to identify and record links and interdependencies
So that I can build a clearer picture of the landscape
